recipe.title: Caipirinha II
ingredients: Garnish: lime wedges and/or sugarcane sticks
instructions: Squeeze enough juice from limes to measure 2 cups.In a pitcher, stir together lime juice and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Add ice cubes and cachaça, stirring until combined well. Serve drinks garnished with lime wedges and/or sugarcane.
